definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: She could fly because of the intake of the pills.
sentences.chinese: 由於藥片的進水閘，她可能飛行。

sentences.english: Oral birth control pills contain hormones that prevent ovulation and reduce the severity of menstrual cramps.
sentences.chinese: 口服含激素的藥片會阻止排卵和降低痛經的嚴重度。

sentences.english: The pills flood the thyroid gland with non-radioactive iodine.
sentences.chinese: 這種藥片可以使甲狀腺充滿非放射性碘。

sentences.english: I next attempted to hide the pill in some tuna. Albacore , actually.
sentences.chinese: 接着我又將藥片藏在金槍魚裏，其實是青花魚。

sentences.english: But I really do not understand the reference value, there are pills to eat.
sentences.chinese: 但是我確是不明白，在參考值之內有藥片喫。

sentences.english: In the medicine time, Memo can remind olds , even sent the pills to them.
sentences.chinese: 會在吃藥時間，給老人把藥片配好，送到老人面前。

sentences.english: Sugar coating hides the taste of pills.
sentences.chinese: 糖衣掩蓋了藥片的藥味。

sentences.english: B：Would you prefer tablets or liquid form?
Don't chew the tablets before swallowing, or you may throw them up.
sentences.chinese: 不要把藥片嚼碎再吞嚥，否則你會吐出來的。

sentences.english: This pill had me going at the gym longer than without a supplement.
sentences.chinese: 喫這個藥片後我能繞體育館走更長的路了。

sentences.english: Now tell me about the talbets.
sentences.chinese: 現在告訴我有關藥片的事。

sentences.english: The doctor prescribed some pills for my cold.
sentences.chinese: 爲了治感冒，醫生給我開了一些藥片。

sentences.english: I did as instructed and put the pill inside the veggie cheese.
sentences.chinese: 我照章辦事，將藥片混在素食乾酪裏面。

sentences.english: Dissolve the tablet in warm water.
sentences.chinese: 把藥片放進溫水中溶化。

sentences.english: Does a polypill have more benefits?
sentences.chinese: 多效藥片是否更具優勢？

sentences.english: Decongestant sprays and pills may reduce the swelling in your nasal passages.
sentences.chinese: 解充血噴霧以及藥片或許能夠減少你鼻道的腫脹。

definition: antipyretic (drug to reduce fever, such as sulfanilamide)
dichlorvos C4H7Cl2PO4, organic phosphate used as insecticide (loanword)/also called dimethyl dichloro-vinyl phosphate DDVP
herbal plaster applied to a wound
essential balm containing menthol, eucalyptus oil etc, used as a mosquito repellant
dilettante/amateur/to dabble in/to flirt with (a topic)
raw materials for making soup/packaged soup mix
medicine to be taken after being mixed with water (or other liquid)
